div1.head: Letter from J. E. Lopez-Silvero to Frederick F. Russell, July 21, 1932
div1.opener:

New York, N. Y.
My dear Dr. Russell:
div1.p:
We are going to publish in the “Revista Médica Farmaceutica”
an article is memory of the late Dr. Henry Rose Carter, whose
remarkable work in tropical medice is well known by all our
Latin-American colleagues.

The death of Dr. Carter has been very much regretted and the
readers of the “Revista Médica Farmaceutica” will find the
article very interesting.

We would gratefully appreciate if you would be so kind as
to send us a picture of the late Dr. Carter to be published
with the article. This picture will be returned to you as
soon as it has served our purpose.

Thanking you in advance for your kind attention to my request,
I am
div1.closer: Very cordially yours, J E Lopez-Silvero Dr. J. E. Lopez-Silvero, M.D.
